article_title: FDA Advisory on Surgical Device Divides Doctors
article_text:
An advisory from the Food and Drug Administration that strongly cautioned doctors against performing a common surgical procedure on women is upending the landscape of gynecological care across the U.S.

The FDA surprised gynecologists last month when it issued an advisory against using a device called a laparoscopic power morcellator, saying it can spread a dangerous hidden cancer. The bladed tool is used in minimally invasive...
